thread.title: BRIEF-Carvana Says In Connection With Deal To Acquire Car360, Unit Paid About $6.7 Mln & Issued 930,047 New Class A Common Units

title: BRIEF-Carvana Says In Connection With Deal To Acquire Car360, Unit Paid About $6.7 Mln & Issued 930,047 New Class A Common Units
text:
Market News  23 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Carvana Says In Connection With Deal To Acquire Car360, Unit Paid About $6.7 Mln & Issued 930,047 New Class A Common Units Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Carvana Co: 
* CARVANA SAYS IN CONNECTION WITH DEAL TO ACQUIRE CAR360, UNIT PAID ABOUT $6.7 MILLION & ISSUED 930,047 NEW CLASS A COMMON UNITS - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2EUly9B ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
